text.sentence: Hi Jeffrey: I was just thinking of e-mailing you -- happy birthday, or happy birthday 3 days late!
I can never remeber if it is the 21st or the 24th?
I don't know that I'm really used to being someone's mother.
I prefer to think of myself as an older sister.
:) Michael gets really annoyed (and I think scared) when I say that.
I'm actually in tampa right now visiting for a couple weeks (until June 7th).
Lezzie is coming in too this weekend with her daughter, who my father described as "the Bruiser".
Apparently, she's on the larger side.
Ann Kelley will also be here with her daughter.
I will call you while I am here - maybe today or tomorrow.
Not neccessary, but if you want to send something to Quinn (perhaps a piggy bank:) you could either send it to my parents house while I'm here or to our address in Sao Paulo.
I hope all is good with you -- will call for an update.
And I'm very saddened by the passing of the Couch Potato.
I feel as though we need to have a service of somekind.
After the Delano-style pool, will there still be room in your yard for a small burial site?:)
text.signature: Stefanie my parents' address: 4922 Bay Way Drive Tampa FL 33629 my address: Rua Baltazaar da Veiga, 161 Edificio Balmoral Apto. 161 Sao Paulo, SP 04510-000 Brasil
